title: Sustainability & Space Debris - Orbital Temple-ah hian a awm a, a chhuahna tur hmun leh a hmanna tur hmun a awm lo
heading: Awm reng thei

intro.paragraph1: Art hian nakin lawkah min hruai dawn a nih chuan, kan hmachhawn tur harsatnate—environment tlakchhiatna, khawtlang inthlauhna, leh space debris-te harsatna lian zel chu a ngaihthah thei lo. Orbital Temple hi heng thil tak tak te hi ngaihtuah chunga duan a ni a, khawvelah leh orbit-ah pawh mawhphurhna nei taka awm tum a ni.
intro.paragraph2: Sustainability hi kan tihkhawtlai ni lovin kan artistic vision-a thil pawimawh tak a ni tih kan ring. Material, orbit leh operation chungchanga thutlukna siam apiang hian Lei leh boruak pahnih hi kan hmuh aia tha zawka chhuahsan kan tumna a lantir a ni.

spaceDebris.heading: Space Debris a awm
spaceDebris.paragraph1: Space debris hi space exploration-a harsatna lian ber pakhat a ni. Satellite leh fragment awm tawh lo sang tam takin khawvel hi an rawn vel a, active mission te chu a ti hlauhawm a, cascade effect a siam a, chu chuan orbit thenkhat chu hman theih loh turin a siam thei a ni.
spaceDebris.paragraph2: Orbital Temple hian hei hi kawng hrang hrangin a sawi a:

list.orbit: Sun-synchronous orbit at 525 km: He altitude hian natural atmospheric drag hian satellite hi kum 10 vel chhungin khawvel boruakah a lut leh thei dawn tih a tichiang a, chutah chuan a kang vek dawn a ni. Hun rei tak chhunga orbital debris-ah hian kan thawhhlawk lo.
list.size: PocketQube design: 50×58×64mm leh 245g chauh a nih avangin satellite hi a te tawk a, re-entry laiin a vaporize vek thei a, khawvel leilung chungah hian bawlhhlawh a awm lo.
list.responsibility: No planned obsolescence: Commercial satellite kalsan theih ang lo takin Orbital Temple hi natural taka deorbit thei tura duan a ni a, mawhphurtu space activity atana international guidelines zawm a ni.

spaceDebris.paragraph3: Earth orbit hniam leh design compact tak kan thlan hian Orbital Temple space-a awm chu hun eng emaw chen atan leh boruak bawlhhlawh lo a nih theih nan kan enkawl a ni.

carbonNeutrality.heading: Carbon Neutrality a awm lo
carbonNeutrality.content: Orbital Temple nena inzawm carbon emission zawng zawng—satellite siamna, launching, ground station kalpui, website hosting, leh team travel te pawh huamin—verified carbon credit program hmanga offset kim vek a ni ang. He mission hi climate-neutral-a siam turin kan inpeih reng a ni.

openSource.heading: Open Source Hardware hmanga siam a ni
openSource.paragraph1: Sustainability tih hian hriatna tihral loh tihna a ni bawk. Orbital Temple-a technical lam zawng zawng—schematics, code, communication protocols, leh sak dante—chu open source documentation angin tihchhuah a ni ang.
openSource.paragraph2: Hei hian nakin lawka mission-te chu a bul atanga tan ai chuan kan hnathawhnaah a innghat thei a, hei hian research leh development mamawh loh a tihtlem phah a ni. Space technology hman theihna chu democratize-ah a siam a, a bik takin Global South-a khawtlang, tunhma aṭanga space exploration aṭanga paih chhuah tawhte tan a ni.

educational.heading: Zirna lama nghawng a neih dan
educational.paragraph1: Kan free multilingual educational program hian khawvel puma zirlai te chu satellite siam leh kahchhuah dan a zirtir a, Global South lam a ngaih pawimawh ber a ni. Space technology lama thiamna hmanga thlah tharte tihchakna hmang hian "Space Gap" khar leh chutiang ni lo se chuan awm lo tur hun remchang siamnaah kan thawhhlawk hle.
educational.paragraph2: He zirna mission hi amah ngei pawh hi sustainability chi khat a ni—satellite dam chhung piah lama inthlak danglamna nghet tak siam turin mi leh khawtlang tana sum dah a ni.

tenYear.heading: Kum 10 chhung Mission a ni
tenYear.paragraph1: Orbital Temple hi kum sawm chhung zet mission atan ruahman a ni a, publicity stunt tawi tak atan ruahman a ni lo. Kum sawm chhungin satellite hian khawvel hi vawi 50,000 vel a vel ang a, hming a dawng ang a, space hi commons, mi zawng zawng tana hman theih a nih theih thu hriat nawn tirna atan a thawk ang.
tenYear.paragraph2: A mission zawh hnuah satellite hian a pianphungah a de-orbit ang a, a kang chhuak ang a, a telte hriatrengna leh documentation-ah chauh lo chuan engmah a awm tawh lo ang.

artsResponsibility.heading: Art-a Mawhphurhna
artsResponsibility.paragraph1: Art hi a hun laia darthlalang a ni fo a, kan hlutna leh duhthusamte a pholang a ni. Climate crisis leh inequality lo pung zel karah hian artist-te hian heng thilte hi comment mai ni lovin active taka hmachhawn thei tur hna siam turin mawhphurhna an nei niin kan ring.
artsResponsibility.paragraph2: Orbital Temple hi mi zawng zawng huapzo, boruak tichhe thei tura mawhphurhna nei, khawvel hnena a hriatna thehdarh kawngah thilpek pe thei artwork siam kan tumna a ni. Nunna leh zawn chhuah theihna siamtu system chhe tak tak—environmental leh orbital—te zah chungin mi zawng zawng tel tura sawmtu art a ni.
